preditor.url.description: The URL of the Preditor server.

preditor.charsBefore.description: The number of characters before the cursor to send to the server.

preditor.charsAfter.description: The number of characters after the cursor to send to the server.

preditor.infilling.maxLength.description: The maximum number of tokens generated during infilling.

preditor.infilling.numVariants.description: The number of variants that infilling chooses from.

preditor.prediction.maxLength.description: The maximum number of tokens generated during prediction.

preditor.prediction.confidence.description: Higher confidence leads to longer suggestions.

preditor.substitution.minVariants.description: The minimum number of variants added in each iteration. (advanced)

preditor.substitution.relaxCount.description: The number of nodes relaxed in a batch. (advanced)

preditor.substitution.poolFactor.description: What multiple of relax_count to use as the pool size for node selection. (advanced)

preditor.substitution.lpAlpha.description: The exponent in the length penalty function. Higher values speed up the search but may yield incorrect results.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
